about.title: Why Choose Lules
about.subtitle: We set the standard for premium cleaning services in New York City
about.description: Lules is New York City's professional cleaning team providing expert residential, commercial, and specialized cleaning services. For more than a decade, our dedicated cleaners have served clients across all NYC boroughs including Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens and more.
about.footerDescription: Lules is New York City's professional cleaning team providing expert residential, commercial, and specialized cleaning services. For more than a decade, our dedicated cleaners have served clients across all NYC boroughs including Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens and more.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To achieve recognition and establish our team as leaders in cleaning services, while always maintaining friendly relationships with our clients.

goal.title: Our Goal
goal.description: To provide tailored cleaning solutions that exceed expectations and create employment opportunities for our growing team.

benefits.title: Professional Team
benefits.description: Our dedicated team of trained cleaners brings extensive expertise and experience in premium cleaning services.

benefits.title: Eco-Friendly
benefits.description: We use only sustainable, environmentally responsible cleaning products and practices.

benefits.title: Quality Guaranteed
benefits.description: Meticulous attention to detail ensures immaculate results every single time.

benefits.title: 100% Trustworthy
benefits.description: All staff thoroughly vetted, insured, and committed to your complete satisfaction.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive cleaning solutions tailored to your unique needs

list.title: Residential Cleaning
list.description: New York City's Home & Apartment Cleaning Experts
list.longDescription: Liven up your home with the simple comfort of a clean home. Our dedicated customer service representatives make sure our cleaners will arrive at your home with instructions specifically tailored for the job from laundry and ironing to careful stainless-steel cleaning.
list.fullText: We also offer deep, heavy duty house cleaning services. Available on a regular basis or short notice, six days a week, everyday, weekends, and holidays.

faqs.question: Are you licensed and insured?
faqs.answer: Yes, we are fully bonded and insured.

faqs.question: How do I pay for your service?
faqs.answer: Payments can be made either by check or major credit cards.

faqs.question: What is the cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: If it is necessary to cancel a cleaning appointment, please notify us at least 24 hours in advance.

faqs.question: Should I tip the cleaner?
faqs.answer: Gratuities, while not required, are greatly appreciated by our cleaning staff.

faqs.question: What areas does Lules serve?
faqs.answer: Lules is proud to serve clients all across New York City, including Manhattan, Brooklyn Heights, Long Island City, Williamsburg and Astoria.

list.title: Commercial Cleaning
list.description: Professional Cleaning for Retail & Hospitality Businesses
list.longDescription: A clean business reflects your commitment to excellence. Our commercial cleaning services are customized to maintain your business standards and impress your clients.
list.fullText: Whether you need daily, weekly, or customized schedules, we deliver professional-grade cleaning tailored to your business needs.
list.whyChoose: Why Choose Lules for Commercial Cleaning?

faqs.question: Can you work around my business hours?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer flexible scheduling including after-hours service.

faqs.question: Do you provide cleaning supplies?
faqs.answer: Yes, we supply all necessary eco-friendly cleaning materials.

list.title: Move-In/Out Cleaning
list.description: Complete Cleaning for Your Moving Day
list.longDescription: Moving is stressful enough. Let our team handle the cleaning so you can focus on settling in smoothly.
list.fullText: Our move-in/out cleaning services ensure pristine conditions whether you're the one leaving or arriving at your new space.

faqs.question: How long does move-out cleaning take?
faqs.answer: It depends on the size of the space, typically 4-8 hours for a standard apartment.

list.title: Office Cleaning
list.longDescription: A clean office boosts productivity and creates a professional impression.
list.fullText: We customize our services to your office needs and schedule.

faqs.question: Can you clean during business hours?
faqs.answer: We offer flexible scheduling. Most clients prefer after-hours cleaning to minimize disruption.

list.title: Deep Cleaning
list.longDescription: Our team delivers intensive cleaning reaching every corner and crevice of your space.
list.fullText: Sometimes your home or business needs more than regular cleaning. Our deep cleaning service is the solution.

faqs.question: How often should I get deep cleaning?
faqs.answer: We recommend deep cleaning 1-2 times per year for most homes.

list.title: Specialized Services
list.longDescription: Beyond standard cleaning, we offer specialized services for unique situations.
list.fullText: From post-construction to carpet care, we handle any cleaning challenge.

faqs.question: What makes a service specialized?
faqs.answer: Specialized services address unique cleaning needs beyond standard residential or commercial cleaning.

difference.title: What Makes Us Different
difference.subtitle: With years of experience, we have the tools and expertise to make a real difference.

features.title: Flexible Scheduling
features.description: We work around your schedule with same-day service available. Book cleaning at times that fit your busy lifestyle, including evenings and weekends.

features.title: Women-Owned & Operated
features.description: Founded and led by women who understand the importance of a clean, welcoming home. We bring attention to detail and care to every space we clean.

features.title: Plant Care Included
features.description: We don't just clean around your plants‚Äîwe care for them! Gentle dusting of leaves, proper watering, and repositioning for optimal light.

features.title: Pet-Friendly Service
features.description: We love your furry family members! Our team is trained to work safely around pets, and we use pet-safe cleaning products throughout your home.

pricing.title: GREAT SERVICE. SIMPLE CHARGES.
pricing.subtitle: Lules is the leading home and office cleaning company in NYC. It is our goal to understand our clients' needs, in order to provide the best possible services. If you have any questions or require any information about our prices and services, please call us at (347) 617-8182. Our customer service will be happy to answer any questions you may have.

items.label: minimum charge, covering 3 hours of work
charge if Lules provides cleaning supplies
Supplies include vacuum cleaner, mop, bucket, and anything else required for the job
flat-rate covers one cleaning person and all cleaning supplies & equipment for 1 day (6-8 hours) to complete whatever the cleaner is able to do within the 8 hours

testimonial.text: If you are looking for house cleaning services in NYC within an affordable price range, go for Lules. Highly recommended...!!
testimonial.author: Jack T.

customQuote.title: Need Something Custom?
customQuote.description: Every space is unique. Get a personalized quote tailored to your specific needs.

faq.question: How is the final price determined?
faq.answer: Our base prices depend on your home size and chosen package. We provide a free in-home estimate to give you an exact quote.

faq.question: Do you offer discounts for recurring service?
faq.answer: Yes! Weekly clients save 15%, bi-weekly save 10%, and monthly save 5% off our standard rates.

faq.question: What's included in the price?
faq.answer: All cleaning supplies, eco-friendly products, and professional equipment are included. No hidden fees.

faq.question: Can I customize my package?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We can add or remove services to create the perfect cleaning plan for your needs.

faq.question: Is there a cancellation fee?
faq.answer: We require 24-hour notice for cancellations. Late cancellations may incur a fee.
